p: Even if pharmaceutical companies prefer combinatorial chemistry library strategies, the large diversity of natural products offers a wide range of antimicrobials [ 5]. Plant sources of anti-staphylococcal compounds should be highlighted due to reports in the literature of remarkable activities of acylphloroglucinols or terthiophenes, which have minimum inhibitory concentrations (MIC) of less than 1 Î¼g/mL [ 5].
